title: Coming Soon: “The Daily”
description: This is how the news should sound. Fifteen minutes a day. Five days a week. Hosted by Michael Barbaro. Powered by New York Times journalism. Starting Feb. 1.
author: thedaily@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
